mapper.select: select count(*) from review where roomNum=#{num}
select roomNum, name roomName, weekAmPrice, reviewImageUrl, rating, content from review re inner join room ro on re.roomNum = ro.num
select ifnull(round(avg(rating),0),0) from review where roomNum=#{num}

select r.name,content,answerContent,rating,reviewImageUrl,re.writeday,bd.num,re.roomNum from review re inner join room r on re.roomNum= r.num inner join bookingDetail bd on re.bookingDetailNum=bd.num where re.userNum=#{userNum} ${sort}
mapper.insert: insert into review (num, content, rating, reviewImageUrl, writeday, userNum, roomNum, bookingDetailNum) values (null, #{content}, #{rating}, #{uploadFile}, now(), #{userNum}, #{roomNum}, #{bookingDetailNum})
mapper.update: update review set content = #{content}, rating = #{rating}, reviewImageUrl = #{uploadFile},writeday = now() where num = #{num}
mapper.select: select content from review where bookingDetailNum=#{bookingDetailNum};

select re.num, r.name,content,rating,re.writeday,reviewImageUrl,roomNum,m.nickname from review re inner join room r on re.roomNum= r.num inner join member m on re.userNum= m.idx where r.hostNum= #{hostNum} ${sort};
